title: Dino--Draw's SCiPTEMBER 2022 Art!
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:cosmonaut twilight=--]]


[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[tabview]]
[[tab Day 1 - Factory]]

++++ **SCiPTEMBER Day 1 - Factory**
[[image https://i.imgur.com/fpuVxsC.png]]
First day piece completed (and also first post of mine of this site oh boy oh boy)! 
Done for the tale [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/this-toy-facsimile-of-life 'This Toy Facsimile of Life'] written by [[*user Darkstuff]]
and [[*user DeviantDharma]]!
The side-by-side storytelling that was swapping between two perspectives was really really fun, which spurred the idea of a split-down-the-middle art piece, featuring two moments I think was sort of a turning point in the story- Cornelius revealing to Redd what he's been doing behind literal closed doors and the plan he has to get out of this mess as the fight against the Factory in this world is a loosing battle, and Nobody finding Holly within the world overtaken by the Factory and deciding to //care// about the situation for the first time in eons.
(also I was ESTATIC to find that there were character design references in the canon hub this tale hails from, so I utilized those to be accurate to the characters featured)
[[/tab]]
[[tab Day 2 - Reanimation]]
++++ **SCiPTEMBER Day 2 - Reanimation**
[[image https://i.imgur.com/05MkmW7.png]]
Done for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6842 'SCP-6842'] by [[*user DrowningDutchman]]
Found this beastie, and as someone who LOVES to render fire- knew exactly what I had to do.
Aka draw it!! I loved the SCP itself, the MTF coming in defense of this entity in the face of a cruel doctor and giving that doctor a metaphorical (and probably literal once) middle finger. Does this doggy have a name? They should name the dog. 
[[/tab]]
[[tab Day 3 - Twisted Pines]]
oh god oh fuck i forgot this one i'll get back to it i prommy
[[/tab]]
[[tab Day 4 - Apian]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/NjAD9N4.png]]
Done for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4611 'SCP-4661'] by [[*user Mortos]]
This entry fucking bizarred me and I wanted to draw. bear,,,, 
putting a whole new meaning to the term 'bugbear' methinks dfjghdfkjgdjkfhg
[[/tab]]
[[tab Day 5 - Skeletal]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/xKYmuLh.png]]
Oh look I did something on time this time!! Found [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2999 SCP-2999]  by [[*user Fantem]] and liked the funky kibby. (SCP-2999-B) 
Dr. Staurt <3 
The SCP in general is honestly very cool! I liked the story told with -A and -B. (And the main image on the page fucking jumpscared me. "it's gonna fuckin move" I mutter, still jumping when it does.)
[[/tab]]
[[tab Day 6 - Future]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/3V27xHg.jpg]]
I found [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5215 SCP-5215] and chose it from both title ("Whelp. Sky's Haunted") and aesthetic. I'm a sucker for celestial/star themes!
I just think it was a funky little SCP, messing with fonts to find something that fit what the SCP's description had was fun too!
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
